descriptionNullable:
# Corpus of news articles from Lenta.Ru / Корпус новостей Lenta.Ru

Supplement to [the Lenta.Ru news dataset (until December 2019)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yutkin/corpus-of-russian-news-articles-from-lenta/data)

- Size: 1.23 Gb
- Articles: 496257
- Dates: Dec. 2019 - Dec. 2023

Updated script to download data in current format: [GitHub](https://github.com/mary-lev/Lenta.Ru-News-Dataset)
title: News dataset from Lenta.Ru 2019-2023
subtitle: Latest extension up to 2024
description:
# Corpus of news articles from Lenta.Ru / Корпус новостей Lenta.Ru

Supplement to [the Lenta.Ru news dataset (until December 2019)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/yutkin/corpus-of-russian-news-articles-from-lenta/data)

- Size: 1.23 Gb
- Articles: 496257

Updated script to download data in current format: [GitHub](https://github.com/mary-lev/Lenta.Ru-News-Dataset)
